name: The White Dragon's Arisen
description: To deal with the vortex of stagnation that appeared in Lestania, find Fabio.
steps: Head to Fabio's location in Jingen  in the Dowe Valley.
Head to Erte Deenan and search for the Black Sword.
Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword
Speak with Ringdeel
Head to Gardnox Fortress and search for your comrades.
Rendezvous with Elliot
Search for the Black Sword and the Knights led by Heinz.
Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword
Speak with Heinz
Head to the Temple of Purification,  where Gerd is acting as a decoy.
Head to the Vortex of Stagnation
Defeat the illusion of the Black Knight and destroy the Black Sword.
Speak with Gerd
Head towards Dreed Castle, where Vanessa leads the White Wings Arisen Corps.
Head to Travers in the White Dragon Temple
Clear "The Great Dragon Crystal War:  Castle with No Lord" by accepting the challenge from Travers.
Report to Travers
Head towards Scherzo waiting at Dreed Castle.
Head towards the location of the gate that  appeared in Dreed Castle.
Defeat the encountered demons
Speak with Vanessa
Plunge into the Vortex of Stagnation.
Defeat the Black Knight
Speak with Vanessa
Report to Joseph at the White Dragon Temple
